Articles.Content:
**The title lies! It's in version 0.52!**

Hi, this is my first mod (I will accept criticism graciously).

It has one custom resource:

- Strange Matter: The basis of this mod.

It features 5 parts

1. The ResGen 1 unit itself: This unit will consume ~8.6 units of Strange Matter to produce most units of fuel/resources.
2. The ResGen 2 unit: This is the Mk2 variant of the ResGen 1, able to be fitted onto the Mk2 parts.
3. Strange Matter Collection Unit: So far, this is the only way to actually generate Strange Matter, albeit at a slow pace.
4. Strange Matter Containment Unit: The only thing that can store the Strange Matter. It contains 500 units of SM.
5. Strange Matter Engine: Consumes SM and EC for a reasonable thrust of 150 and an ISP of an ION drive.

As of now, none of these parts have custom models ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif). If anyone could try this mod out (maybe make a custom model+texture) that would be great. The target look for these parts are either Stock-alike or Futuristic.

Pictures!

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/7kfx3)

[Download link from Kerbal Stuff](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/504/ResGen%201)

Contributors:

- Anonymous (Idea for ResGen 2)
- Tafi (patching the issues!)

v0.5 now!
What about Stock Alike with a Futuristic twist hehe ?
That is a good idea! I'll take it into consideration.

just looking at the file and if you wanted you could have done all that with 1 ModuleGenerator then having 6 but it's fine.

EDIT- ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) no problem

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-18T21:27:10Z" title="03/18/2015 09:27  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 18, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**
Well, it is my first mod. Remember that. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
So, where is the Strange Matter collected? Is it collected anywhere, or do you have to be in a certain place for it to generate?

> 
> So, where is the Strange Matter collected? Is it collected anywhere, or do you have to be in a certain place for it to generate?

Looking at the files there are some solar panels that the output are Strange Matter so would say any where with the panels are getting sun light.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-19T03:05:18Z" title="03/19/2015 03:05  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 19, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**

@Kuibrid: Do you think you could post some pictures on the OP? I suggest using Imgur because you can use a special tag to put the album on the page, take a look at [this page](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/106784-The-Forum-BBCode-Tutorial) for a bunch of things you can do, including how to embed the Imgur album
I'll get to that right away! It may take a bit though; need to get some pics!

I suggest using Imgur because you can use a special tag to put the album on the page, take a look at [this page](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/106784-The-Forum-BBCode-Tutorial) for a bunch of things you can do, including how to embed the Imgur album

Done!

> 
> Done!

Great! The pictures look amazing. I'll give it a download now. And if I ever get into modeling (I plan to make a mod myself based around probes) I'll try and give you a hand!
Isn't resgen the name of one of the B9 dependencies?
I don't know; if it is, then it is completely coincidence. The B9 developer also never contacted me about it, so I'm going to leave it as it is until he\she does.

> 
> Isn't resgen the name of one of the B9 dependencies?

Huh... so thats why people have a ResGen folder. Yeah, the release notes say that it uses the plugin for airbreathing engines.

I'll update it for 1.0, it has problems but not too terrible.
